text: Dan Futterman (born June 8, 1967) is an American actor, screenwriter, and producer. ==Awards== Futterman wrote the screenplay for the movie Capote. Then he had an Academy Award nomination, an Independent Spirit, Boston Society of Film Critics, and Los Angeles Film Critics Association awards. He got another Academy Award nomination for co-writing the script to Foxcatcher in 2014. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters
title: Dan Futterman
